name: Farming (Hobbes_)
description:
If the game is slowing down, click on it. If it's still very slow, you can try reloading the page, but THE GAME DOES NOT SAVE, SO DON'T RELOAD THE PAGE IF YOU WANT THE GAME TO STAY.

This is a simple farming simulator to test two things:

Exporting games to HTML with Godot, 

The tutorial system for my game.

This farming minigame will be used in my current game, which is currently unnamed. It will be one of four ways to earn money to use in-game. (The other three being fishing, mining, and construction).
